original_title: Baby Genius: A Trip To The San Diego Zoo
overview: Part of a series of "edutainment videos" for young children, Baby Genius combines different images with classical music. The series is designed to offer pint-sized viewers fun and instructive programs about the world around us. Baby Genius: A Trip to the San Diego Zoo includes footage of pandas, hippos, polar bears and tigers at the world-famous zoo.
title: Baby Genius: A Trip To The San Diego Zoo
